Pre-Game Insights: Chile's manager Eduardo Berizzo resigned after a 0-0 draw with Paraguay.
Ecuador are in the top six but are fighting to get into contention despite starting with a three-point deduction.
Ecuador's captain Enner Valencia and offensive full-back Pervis Estupinan are out injured.
Chile will be without Victor Mendez after he was sent off late in the draw with Paraguay.
Chile's talisman Alexis Sanchez apologized to his former manager.
